fields_of_interest: Economy, finance and the euro, Single market
eu_initiatives: Digital Single Market, Payment Services Directive, Interchange Fee Regulation, General Data Protection Regulation

goals__remit: First Data enables global commerce and delivers innovative payment technology and services solutions. Our company is anchored in the EU and works with clients in 20 Member States. First Data's engagement with EU institutions seeks to promote growth across the EU market.
position: Senior Vice President and Head of Public Affairs
